value:
$WmMEID_エイトリ,ch00_35_Eitri_F_Normal,Face|Well done. You made it! Now, where
would you like me to begin?$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|You said you served the first king
of Niðavellir. Was that true?$k$p$WmMEID_エイトリ,ch00_35_Eitri_F_Normal,Face_Smile|Yes. This body is just a vessel,
you see.$k$p$EFace|The original me lived... Hm. I can't
seem to remember! Suffice it to say,
I've lived thousands of years.$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Th-thousands?!$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|The legends and myths across all the
many worlds make mention of beings
blessed with extremely long lives...$k$p$EFace_Anger|Eitri, are you a dragon?$k$p$WmMEID_エイトリ,ch00_35_Eitri_F_Normal,Face_Cool|Ahahaha! No, no... Alas, I am still
a mere mortal. More or less.$k$p$EFace|I did manage to borrow some talents
from a dragon, however...$k$pWhen my body ceases to live, I can
transfer my essence to a new vessel,
a new body.$k$pBy doing so countless times, I have
shaped Niðavellir and safeguarded it
for many long years.$k$p$EFace_Smile2|In the castle... You know the murals
and statues of all the great figures
from the history of Niðavellir?$k$pAlfrik, Dvalinn, Billingr, Grer...$k$pAll of them were me.$k$p$WmMPID_レギン,ch00_30_Reghin_F_Normal,Face_Pain|You were...ALL of them?!$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|Fáfnir and the other failed summons
you performed... And Járngreipr,
a weapon designed to destroy gates...$k$pAll of it was in service to Niðavellir?$k$p$WmMEID_エイトリ,ch00_35_Eitri_F_Normal,Face_Smile|Yes! Askr's ability to summon beings
from other worlds is a terrible threat!
It had to be addressed.$k$p$WmMPID_レギン,ch00_30_Reghin_F_Normal,Face_Pain|But, Eitri... Why go as far as you did?$k$p$WmMEID_エイトリ,ch00_35_Eitri_F_Normal,Face|For him...for His Majesty.$k$pWe built this country together. It was
our child. We wanted it to succeed.$k$pHe fell ill while he was still young,
and now I...I must do the work alone,
in his place.$k$p$EFace_Smile|Reginn, you are his descendant.
Be proud. Use your gifts.$k$pReturn the life Fáfnir has wrung from
this land and return Niðavellir to its
rightful state as greatest of all realms.$k$p$EFace_Smile2|With the power of seiðjárn at
your command, you should have
no difficulty.$k$p$WmMPID_レギン,ch00_30_Reghin_F_Normal,Face_Pain|I...I don't care about any of that!
There is only one thing I want!$k$p$EFace_Pain2|I want my brothers back! Bring back
Fáfnir and Ótr!$k$p$WmMEID_エイトリ,ch00_35_Eitri_F_Normal,Face|...Is that all? Simple enough.$k$p$WmMPID_レギン,ch00_30_Reghin_F_Normal,Face_Pain|What do you—$k$p$WmMEID_エイトリ,ch00_35_Eitri_F_Normal,Face_Cool|Your friend there is the summoner.
Summon new brothers from one of
the infinite other worlds. Done!$k$pThey may be slightly different from
the brothers you knew, but... They
will at least look the part!$k$p$WmMPID_レギン,ch00_30_Reghin_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Eitri, I—$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|Does life mean nothing to you?!$k$p$WmMPID_レギン,ch00_30_Reghin_F_Normal,Face_Anger|...We're done. I won't hear any more
from you, Eitri. My Niðavellir has no
place for you in it!$k$p$EFace_Cool|The Niðavellir of the past is nothing
but ancient history.$k$pAs your queen, I command you join it!$k$p$WmMEID_エイトリ,ch00_35_Eitri_F_Normal,Face_Anger|Aha! Gramr, hm? I see... There is
a twist I hadn't accounted for...$k$p$EFace_Smile2|Will that relic be enough against the
might of seiðjárn? I will admit, I'm
curious to know the answer.$k$pLet's test it... We'll find out together.$k$p

$WmMPID_レギン,ch00_30_Reghin_F_Normal,Face_Cool|HYAAHHH!$k$p$SspSE_BATTLE_STING1|$Fo500,255,0,0,150|$Fi500|$WmMEID_エイトリ,ch00_35_Eitri_F_Normal,Face_Pain|...Guh!$k$pA dragon's power, ancient as it is...
is still something to behold.$k$pEven I...was no match...$k$pDamn it... If only I had...a little
more time...$k$p$SbpBGM_EVENT_SERIOUS_03,0|$WmMPID_レギン,ch00_30_Reghin_F_Normal,Face_Anger|...Eitri?$k$p$WmMEID_エイトリ,ch00_35_Eitri_F_Normal,Face_Smile|You do look...just like him...$k$p$SspSE_EFFECT_ORB_DEBUFF|$Fo500,255,255,255,255|$Fi500|$w0|$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Pain|*gasp* She's...turned to dust!$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|The result of a power too great for
the likes of mortals perhaps.$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face|This means it's all over, doesn't it?$k$p...I believe a coronation may be in
order, Princess Reginn. There is
nothing between you and the throne.$k$p$WmMPID_レギン,ch00_30_Reghin_F_Normal,Face_Pain|The Crown of the Dvergar... It's all
because of this...$k$p$EFace_Anger|...YAH!$k$p$SspSE_EFFECT_TENKU|$Fo500,255,255,255,255|$Fi500|$w0|$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Pain|P-Princess Reginn! You smashed it!
Won't you need it?$k$p$WmMPID_レギン,ch00_30_Reghin_F_Normal,Face|No. This land needs to be free from
Eitri's corruption, starting now.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Smile|Princess Reginn, I... You're right.
It's for the best.$k$p$Sbs150|

$WmMEID_ダグ,ch00_34_Dagr_F_Normal,Face_Smile|All right! Sounds like everything's
settled here—and I've got my own
situation to attend to back home...$k$p$EFace|Do you have everything you
need, Reginn?$k$p$WmMPID_レギン,ch00_30_Reghin_F_Normal,Face|Yes, I think so... Thank you so much!$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|Rebuilding Niðavellir will be an
enormous undertaking, but if we
can offer any help, we gladly will.$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Pain|I guess it's goodbye for now, Princess
Reginn... Oh, I'm going to cry!$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face|Please come visit us in Askr.
Whenever you'd like. And please...
take care.$k$p$WmMPID_レギン,ch00_30_Reghin_F_Normal,Face_Pain|...$k$p$WmMEID_ダグ,ch00_34_Dagr_F_Normal,Face|...Reginn? Are you sure you'll be
all right? You're looking a little...sick.$k$p$WmMPID_レギン,ch00_30_Reghin_F_Normal,Face|Huh?! Wh-what do you mean?
I'm fine!$k$p$WmMEID_ダグ,ch00_34_Dagr_F_Normal,Face|...If you say so!$k$pThen, uh... See ya around!$k$p$WmMPID_レギン,ch00_30_Reghin_F_Normal,Face_Pain|I, er... Wait! Don't go!$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|Princess Reginn?$k$p$WmMPID_レギン,ch00_30_Reghin_F_Normal,Face_Pain|I... I don't know if I can do this!$k$pHow am I supposed to be a good
queen, all alone, without my
brothers beside me...$k$pI wish I could spend more time with
you all, and travel to new places...
I could learn so much.$k$p$EFace_Cry|And I...I love you all so much! Saying
goodbye is making my heart ache!$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Princess Reginn... Please don't cry.
You're going to make me cry too!$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Pain|We don't want to say goodbye either.
It's just that...$k$p$WmMPID_レギン,ch00_30_Reghin_F_Normal,Face_Pain|*sniff* I know... I understand.$k$p$EFace_Smile|*sigh*$k$pPhew! Crying a little helped! Sorry
I'm so selfish, everyone... And thank
you all again...for everything!$k$p$EFace|I'll do my best, even if I have to do
it all alone! Don't worry about me...$k$p$WmMEID_ダグ,ch00_34_Dagr_F_Normal,Face|That's it! You've guilted me into it!
Why don't you let your good pal Dagr
take some of the heavy lifting? *wink*$k$p$WmMPID_レギン,ch00_30_Reghin_F_Normal,Face|Princess Dagr?$k$p$WmMEID_ダグ,ch00_34_Dagr_F_Normal,Face|I'll talk to Mom and ask if the jötnar
can keep an eye on Niðavellir for you
for a while.$k$pYou can make me, uh...viceroy!
I'll handle things while you're away.
...How does that sound?$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face|You mean...you'd be the one ruling
over Niðavellir, Princess Dagr?$k$p$WmMEID_ダグ,ch00_34_Dagr_F_Normal,Face|Sure! I mean, I'm next in line for
the throne in Jötunheimr now...$k$p$EFace_Smile|You're not the only one who needs to
get some experience out in the world!$k$pIt feels like the right thing to do.
And I think Mom will agree.$k$p$WmMPID_レギン,ch00_30_Reghin_F_Normal,Face|Are you...sure? I don't know what
to say! It's like a dream!$k$p$EFace_Pain|But the people of Niðavellir would
have to agree to it, wouldn't they?$k$pAssuming they even recognize me as
their queen in the first place...$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Smile|Reginn, you are the hero who
defeated the tyrant Fáfnir.$k$pI think the people might allow you
this small indulgence.$k$p$EFace|Especially since the end result will
be to the benefit of Niðavellir and
its future. Right, Princess Reginn?$k$p$WmMPID_レギン,ch00_30_Reghin_F_Normal,Face_Smile|Yes! Oh, yes! I will learn so much—as
much as I possibly can!$k$pI won't rest until I can defend my
kingdom and its people! And that's
a promise!$k$p$WmMEID_ダグ,ch00_34_Dagr_F_Normal,Face|Great! Then, uh... See ya around!$k$pAnd don't forget to have a little fun
while you're at it, eh, Reginn? *wink*$k$pNiðavellir's in good hands.$k$p$WmMPID_レギン,ch00_30_Reghin_F_Normal,Face|Princess Dagr, I... Thank you
so much!$k$pI'll figure out a way to repay you and
Jötunheimr someday!$k$p$WmMEID_ダグ,ch00_34_Dagr_F_Normal,Face|All right, now I actually should
get going.$k$p$EFace_Smile|Take care of yourselves, Alfster,
Share-Bear—all of you Askrans!
And $Nu too!$k$pAnd you better come visit or I'll think
you forgot about your pal Dagr.$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Smile|We'll definitely visit! Right, Alfonse?$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|Yes, of course.$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Smile|Seems we still have a long road to
travel ahead...$k$pSo no sense in slowing down! Right,
Princess Reginn?$k$pLet's go, $Nu!$k$p$Fo1500,0,0,0,255|$WmMPID_レギン,ch00_30_Reghin_F_Normal,Face|$Fi1500|...$k$pOh, $Nu...$k$pI'm sorry. I'm not holding everyone
up, am I? I wanted to take a last look
at the Niðavellir I knew...$k$p$EFace_Pain2|...Fáfnir wasn't from our world.$k$pÓtr wasn't really my brother.$k$pMy whole life, layers on layers of lies.$k$p$EFace|But still, the kindness my brothers
once showed me... That was real...$k$pThe love I felt for them was real.
I can believe in that at least,
can't I?$k$pDo you think there's a chance
I'll meet someone I can love like
that again?$k$pHeehee... I sure hope so!$k$p$EFace_Smile|Speaking of which...you don't happen
to have anyone in mind, do you?$k$p...Only kidding! Hahaha! The look
on your face was priceless!$k$pWhatever lies ahead, as long as I'm
with my new family of Heroes, I know
everything will turn out great.$k$p$Sbs1500|$Fo1500,0,0,0,255|
